class.name: IKKusudama3D
class.brief_description: Kusudamas are a sequential collection of reach cones, forming a path by their tangents.
class.description: A Kusudama is a ball with a bunch of reach-cones sticking out of it. Except that these reach cones are arranged sequentially, and a smooth path is automatically inferred leading from one cone to the next. Kusudama is taken from the Japanese word for "ball with a bunch of cones sticking out of it".
